== Quote chars in url() property ==

This will fail:
{{{
div
	{
	background-image: url(/images/john's-house.gif);
	}
}}}

Enclosing the string part of the property into quotes will work:
{{{
div
	{
	background-image: url("/images/john's-house.gif");
	}
}}}

== Multiple backslash escape chars following a escaped quote char ===

This will fail:
{{{
a[href~="contains\\\""]
	{
	...
	}
}}}
